reviewText: The Gar-man does his usual awesome, straight up rendition of what A Course in Miracles is REALLY about; no sugar coating, no holds barred, and plenty of laughs.  Thank God there's somebody out there teaching the Course correctly!  How can a student of the Course not love this guy?  Giddy up!

Beyond The Ego Workshop brilliantly lights our way to end our suffering, easily solve all our problems, and opens the door to a new life beyond our wildest imaginings. Gary Renard shows us how to become our own teacher, end all seeking,and live our best lives. And he is funny and engaging.
